description: Health Data service for providing de-identification of health PHI data (Features: Surrogation, multi-modality).

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice create
commands.syntax:
az healthcareapis deidservice create --deid-service-name
                                     --resource-group
                                     [--identity]
                                     [--location]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--public-network-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                     [--tags]
examples: az healthcareapis deidservice create --resource-group rgopenapi --deid-service-name deidTest --location eastus

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice delete
commands.syntax:
az healthcareapis deidservice delete [--deid-service-name]
                                     [--ids]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--yes]
examples: az healthcareapis deidservice delete --resource-group rgopenapi --deid-service-name deidTest

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice list
commands.summary: List DeidService resources by subscription ID.

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice show
examples: az healthcareapis deidservice show --resource-group rgopenapi --deid-service-name deidTest

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice update
commands.syntax:
az healthcareapis deidservice update [--add]
                                     [--deid-service-name]
                                     [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--identity]
                                     [--ids]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--public-network-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                     [--remove]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--set]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--tags]
examples: az healthcareapis deidservice update --name deidTest -g rgopenapi --tags tag=test

commands.name: az healthcareapis deidservice wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
